title: J.C - Diverse Coverage: Brussels Virtual reality festival.
description:
"CINEMA GALERIES, UGC Belgium, screen.brussels, Immersia Films and Samsung EXPERIENCE create the first virtual reality festival (VR) of Belgium!
VR is not just a movie or a video game viewed in a helmet. It is a new audiovisual media with its own language and its own expression format. The aim of this new festival is to share a content developed by independent artists.

Lovers or curious persons are invited to discover these new experiences!"

From 22 to 26 June 2016.

More information on the UGC & Galerie Brussels Festival:
http://www.galeries.be/experience-brussels-virtual-reality-festival/


Thanks for watching.
May the code be with you.
author: Jams Center
